Text:
hi there exec, i thank you for the wonderful Overland Trail i have downloaded 12 episodes but am stuck on 3 of them, 1 hasn't downloaded at all, and 2 have stopped a short way in, is there anyway that you still have the files and could possibly seed them again i would be most grateful and will continue seeding them myself as i am doing with the others
the ones i need seeding on are as follows
The Reckoning
Sour Annie
Daughter of the Sioux

Hey Ajax,

I don't save the files after I'm done seeding them since I have the DVD set.  But someone I know
might be able to help....if he still has his copies, which he burns to his own DVDs.

Hi exec thank you for getting back to me so quick and also thank your friend for me even if he cannot help i much appreciate your help in trying and also if he can help does he have the missing episodes....West of Boston & High Bridge sorry for being such a nuisance but we don't get most of these old western shows here in the UK and my husband loves them

We don't get most of those old westerns here in the U.S unless we susscribe to Encore Westerns channel ( I used to a long time ago ) or buy the DVDs.

My friend didn't save his Mp4 copies of any of the episodes. Sorry.  I don't have time to do them again.

thank you for getting back to me and thank you for trying, anyway i shall still enjoy the doz episodes i downloaded i have been trying to find the DVDs here in the UK might possibly have found somewhere i can purchase them. old western series are very hard to come by over here i usually get most from sky tv on the TCM channel but we havn't got much selsction and they just keep repeating the same ones over

Hey Exec,
It looks like you've wasted a hell of a lot of time and energy on your Kojak torrents because almost all of them are dead, and it's only been a couple weeks.  What a shame...

Just happened to come back to visit and saw your comment, Pooket.   Yes it is a shame but 
that's how it is with torrents when you don't rent a seedbox.....

Sorry, dude, but I have to disagree about the seedbox.  I have many torrents still alive after years, and I never used a seedbox. The way I see it, there are two potential problems.

1) Kojak fans on TPB are low-life vermin.
2) You didn't seed your ratio high enough when you originally uploaded these.

Oh well, thanks anyway.
